Appetizers.description: Enjoy the crunch and flavor of these crispy fried rolls stuffed with a medley of finely chopped vegetables and served with a sweet and sour dipping sauce
Indulge in these spicy and succulent chicken wings marinated in a tangy sauce and deep-fried to perfection
Savor the aroma and taste of these toasted bread slices topped with melted cheese and garlic butter, sprinkled with oregano and parsley
Relish these deep-fried potato wedges seasoned with salt and pepper, accompanied by a creamy mayonnaise dip

Soups.description: Warm up with this fresh and smooth tomato soup garnished with cream and croutons, enhanced with basil and black pepper
Spice up your palate with this spicy and sour soup with vegetables and tofu, flavored with vinegar, soy sauce, and chili sauce
Comfort your soul with this hearty and nourishing soup with chicken, noodles, and vegetables, seasoned with thyme and bay leaf
Delight in this creamy and velvety soup with fresh mushrooms and herbs, topped with a swirl of cream and parsley

Salads.description: Refresh yourself with this vibrant salad with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, feta cheese, and dressing, drizzled with olive oil and lemon juice
Enjoy this classic salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and caesar dressing, tossed with grilled chicken and bacon bits
Satisfy your hunger with this delicious salad with grilled chicken, lettuce, carrots, corn, and dressing, garnished with almonds and cranberries
Treat yourself with this colorful and sweet salad with assorted fruits and honey, sprinkled with mint leaves and coconut flakes

Main Course.description: Experience the aroma and flavor of this fragrant rice dish cooked with vegetables and spices, served with raita and pickle
Savor the taste of this flavorful rice dish cooked with chicken and spices, served with raita and pickle
Relish this rich and creamy curry with cottage cheese and butter, simmered in a tomato-based gravy, served with naan or roti
Indulge in this popular and creamy curry with chicken and butter, cooked in a tomato-based gravy, served with naan or roti
Enjoy this thin crust pizza with cheese and vegetable toppings, baked in a wood-fired oven, served with ketchup and oregano
Delight in this thin crust pizza with cheese and chicken toppings, baked in a wood-fired oven, served with ketchup and oregano
Have fun with this stir-fried noodle dish with vegetables and soy sauce, tossed with sesame seeds and spring onions
Love this stir-fried noodle dish with chicken and soy sauce, tossed with sesame seeds and spring onions
Bite into this tasty burger with a vegetable patty, lettuce, tomato, and cheese, sandwiched between toasted buns, served with fries and coleslaw
Enjoy this juicy burger with a chicken patty, lettuce, tomato, and cheese, sandwiched between toasted buns, served with fries and coleslaw

Desserts.description: Celebrate with this moist and decadent chocolate cake with frosting, decorated with chocolate shavings and cherries
Appreciate this moist and delicious carrot cake with cream cheese frosting, adorned with walnuts and raisins
Cool down with this scoop of your choice of ice cream flavor, topped with whipped cream and nuts
Enjoy this traditional Indian dessert of deep-fried balls soaked in sugar syrup, flavored with cardamom and rose water
Cherish this chewy and fudgy chocolate brownie, served with vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce
Relish this traditional Indian dessert of soft cheese balls soaked in sugar syrup, infused with saffron and pistachios
